text:
MONEYLION: YOU ARE NOT A FREE SERVICE. $9.99 MONTHLY ***AND*** $20+ MONTHLY FOR THE FULL SERVICE APP — NOT JUST NOT-FREE, ACTUALLY KIND OF ON THE EXPENSIVE SIDE. 

YOU ARE NOT ADBLOCK, THE FREE APP WE DONATE TO FOR DOING AN AWESOME SERVICE FOR US AND NOT CHARGING. YOU CHARGE $360 A YEAR. SO WHY, WHEN I GO TO TAKE OUT $300, DO YOU FLOOD ME WITH AD AFTER AD ASKING FOR A "TIP"? (PS you can write "optional" in whatever color you want. When an app with all our personal and banking info makes it clear they expect an "optional" cash deposit, I can't help but note the similarities to the business model in my favorite mob movies.)

TO CLARIFY: A ML CUSTOMER IS NOT TAKING ADVANTAGE OF YOUR HARD WORK, THEY ARE PAYING YOU 30 DOLLARS A MONTH FOR IT. NO MATTER HOW MANY PICTURES OF SAD LITTLE GIRLS FROM STOCKPHOTOS.COM YOU USE TO GUILT US. IF YOUR EMPLOYEES WORK HARD, PAY THEM MORE. I DON'T PAY $150 A MONTH THEN SEND A 10% CASH TIP TO VERIZON EVERYTIME THEY DELIVER MY TEXT MESSAGE SUCCESSFULLY LIKE IT WAS A FAVOR.

Sorry for shouting. But for the people who don't deal with this every day, the main reason I pay $30 a month is for access to this feature, which has been worth it during Covid. You know what makes it not worth it? When in addition to the $30 a month, you make us take the $300 out in $50 max increments, creating 6 separate transactions instead of 1. 

AKA: 6 chances to charge $4.99 to cash out, but more importantly, 6 CHANCES TO SEND 5 POPUPS EACH ASKING FOR AN "OPTIONAL" TIP, AFTER REMINDING YOU YOU "FORGOT" THE "OPTIONAL" TIP LAST $50. I'm not exaggerating, try it: 4 popups and 1 screen where it DEFAULTS TO $5 SO IF YOU MISS IT, YOU TIP $5 ON $50.

SO, TO TAKE OUT $300 TODAY: I did 6 transactions of $50.I saw 30 ads to "leave an optional 10% tip" - for fun, let's say I was going blind and missed the sneaky $5 tip they snuck in without asking. That's $30 in tips, 24 ads clicked out of. I paid $30 in fees to transfer it out, and my $30 monthly just to have Moneylion. So, while they harrass you for tips bc it's "0% APR", you just got $210 and owe $322.96 in two weeks. And if you missed their sneaky tip addition, that's a 35% APR. and you tipped $30 for it.
title: 5 "OPTIONAL TIP" ADS PER $50 INSTACASH. WE PAY $30 A MONTH, WE'RE NOT TIPPING FOR THE SERVICE WE GET IN RETURN

reply.message: Instacash funding is FREE if you choose standard delivery, which takes only 24-48 hours. If you need your Instacash extra fast, you can choose instant Turbo funding for $4.99 (or $3.99 if you have our RoarMoney bank account). The Turbo fee is totally optional and just helps us cover the cost of delivering your cash advance instantly when you’re in a pinch. We appreciate your feedback, and if you have any other questions, please feel free to contact us directly.

text: In every financial area MonyLion assist with my Banking, Investment portfolio and Zero percent interest Loans called Instacash. But the Credit Builder installment loan is my favorite aspect , because my " Poor " credit score rating has moved into the " Fair " scoring in 6 months . By early January 2021 I will be scheduled for " Good " scoring range . All thanks to MoneyLion's monthly reporting to all three credit bureaus.

text: I just recently started using MoneyLion and I absolutely love it! I chose to have my checks direct deposited into my new account and I now get paid two days earlier! Also, it’s all 0% APR!!! They have instacash advances, offer awesome credit building loans and so many other great & helpful financial help. I just got my new card today and I am able to use my virtual card Anywhere that accepts mobile pay as well. I truly enjoy this online bank. I would recommend to everyone!! Thank you 🖤🖤

text: So unfortunately I am closing my account after many discussions with support. I hope that my numerous reviews will get noticed. I worked in business and KNEW that customer service was my #1 priority. With the social media of 2020, companies have a much much bigger chance of losing additional customers. I learned early in my career that for every 1 customer lost 10 more could be potentially lost. That was 15 years ago. Good Luck. Enjoyed while it last e f.
title: Transition to Roar Sucked
